name: Shiro (julianls)
description:
Shiro

Of Japanese origin, either 城 (shiro, “castle”) or 白 (shiro, “white”) but in this case it is just the name of my dog.

Story

Choose your cause, do only good, help your friends and climb sky floating platforms to the Moon.

Tools

My plan is to do it with Unity and see how it goes. I already have some assets in my mind and basic knowledge from past game jams, so I guess I need to find some free time.
